comment.author: 22948027@N02
comment._content: Text in Norwegian under picture one: En klimatisert sau - an acclimated sheep. Picture two: Stationen's husdyr - the station's domestic animals. Under pictures three and four: Stationen's husdyr, som bestaar av ca 300 griser, 3 à 4 melkekjör. - gjeter, en hest, - samt endel höns. - The station's domestic animals, which consists of around 300 pigs, 3 to 4 cows, goats, one horse and several hens.
